description: Try our easy to follow Rocky Road Ice-Cream Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice-cream cake,Seafood free,Low salt,Rocky road,Chocolate,Summer,Quick & easy dessert
name: Rocky Road IceCream Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a rectangular loaf pan with plastic wrap.
Place twelve upsidedown rocky road mallows into prepared pan and spread over softened vanilla ice cream (return unused ice cream to freezer).
Press in marshmallows and nuts and freeze for 2 hours or until firm.
Spread ice cream cake with jam and press in another twelve rocky road mallows, upsidedown. Spread with remaining ice cream, then freeze for a further 2 hours or overnight.
Turn out ice cream cake onto a serving plate and remove plastic wrap. Place eight rocky road mallows on top and drizzle over Ice Magic. Slice to serve.
